name: MRILumbarSpineProcedures
title: MRI Lumbar Spine Procedures
description: This value set is used to calculate OP-8 (MRI Lumbar Spine for Low Back Pain), a claims-based measure used in the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services' Hospital Outpatient Quality Reporting (HOQR) Program.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes for with MRI lumbar spine procedures.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have undergone an MRI lumbar spine procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes for MRI lumbar spine procedures are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with MRI lumbar spine procedures are excluded from this value set. Terminologies other than CPT are also excluded from this value set.)
